resources.string: 目前您的百度贴吧版本过低或未安装，需要安装百度贴吧才能使用
Age should be between born year 12 to 114.
Choose a weight between 44 lbs and 998 lbs
2.Click ‘Start’ button,choose and connect device,the tracker will vibrate if connected.
Connect the tracker with the mains through the charging cable,it will be activated after five seconds light blinks.
a.Charging Voltage:5v DC b.After activation, please continue charging until the charging is completed
充电器通过磁力吸附在表盘背面，手表正面会显示四位数ID号
手机APP点击绑定按钮后，手表会显示出左边的页面
点击确定"YES"按钮，确认绑定
The first equipment bounding need network, if your phone network fails, open network first and try again!
Bluetooth unable to connect the WRISTBAND successfully!Please try again!
To activate,remove tracker and begin charging by connecting the cable to a USB power source
3.Please wait a few seconds and pull off the charging line in 1 min and binding success.
From the “Device List” screen – select the Bluetooth device. If more than one device appears, select the the device that matches the MAC:#### imprinted on the module.
Take off your charger from the wristband
A new firmware update is available. Would you like to update now?
Battery is less than 30%, please charge before updating
Please keep your phone network work when update!
Please keep your phone network work when unbound!

Image not valid or be removed, failed to load.
Image is so large, you can restart the program and try again!

Tip: Supports multi-touch zoom in and out image
Insufficient memory to rotate the picture is not successful, you can restart the program and try again!

%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.

Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

Connection successful! Please unplug the USB Charging Cable.
